mapper.select: select r.* from power_account_role_relation ar left join power_role r on ar.role_id = r.id where ar.account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT ur.id id, ur.gmt_modified gmtModified, ur.gmt_create gmtCreate, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM power_account_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN power_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN power_role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN power_resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.account_id = #{accountId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id
